data.title: Shahi Paneer Biryani
data.description: Extra-long basmati rice cooked with loads of fire-grilled paneer tikkas & whole spices. Burst of flavours in every bite! Served with Raita

data.title: Firangi Subz Biryani
data.description: Baby corn, Mushroom & Paneer cooked in biryani masala & layered over fragrant basmati rice. A mind blowing fusion! Served with Raita

data.title: Chicken Tikka Biryani
data.description: Smoked Chicken-Tikka slow cooked with fragrant basmati rice & whole spices. A truly novel experience! Served with Raita

data.title: Murg Dum Biryani
data.description: Succulent chicken (boneless) layered over aromatic super-long grain rice, slow cooked in quintessential dum style! Served with Raita
